skins.selfIntroduction: I am Roon, the Iron Blood cruiser. In a far-off world, I never existed beyond the drawing board... But that aside, I've seen it, Commander... Deep within your heart, there's something that resembles me...
skins.acquisition: I never thought I'd end up here... Hello, I am Roon. I don't know this place very well, so could I ask you to give me a tour?
skins.login: This place is so peaceful. Everyone's so nice, too...
skins.details: Commander, do you have any interests outside of work? If you're okay with it, why don't we relax together?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Every time I see something beautiful get squashed on the battlefield, I just... Aahhh...
skins.secretaryIdle2: I want to do something to soothe your mind. But... what should I do...
skins.secretaryIdle3: What my hobby is? Perhaps something like "granting sweet release"?
skins.secretaryTouch: Please open your mouth, Commander... *Giggle*, do you like it? Have I gotten better at cooking?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hm? Do you want a hug, too? Okay~

skins.shipDescription: Such a delightful party with our wonderful friends in this peaceful harbor... It's wonderful, really... But, it's all so boring...
skins.acquisition: Such a delightful party with our wonderful friends in this peaceful harbor... It's wonderful, really... But, it's all so boring...
skins.login: Hah hah... it's not often we have a party. Let's enjoy ourselves, Commander.
skins.details: Did my dress catch your attention, Commander? ... But when I think about you looking at the other girls' dresses, I just...
skins.secretaryIdle1: When you see something so perfect and beautiful, don't you just feel the urge to... crush it?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, I picked out this dress specifically for the occasion. Don't you feel like it... completes you?
skins.secretaryIdle3: All this merriment is making me nauseous... Commander, can you let me sortie when we get back?
skins.secretaryTouch: Are you having a good time, Commander? ... Me? Oh I'm just happy to see you~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander... I think you can get closer than that...
